sentences.sContent: We will stand by our friends on the front lines, as we and many nations will do in pledging support for the Pakistani people tomorrow.
sentences.sCn: 我们将与我们的朋友共同站在第一线，正如明天我们和许多国家将要做的那样，保证为巴基斯坦人民提供援助。

sentences.sContent: More than one told me that they saw her as a beacon of hope for young Pakistani women.
sentences.sCn: 不止一个人对我说过，巴基斯坦的年轻女人们把她当作承载希望的灯塔。

trans.tranOther: relating to Pakistan or its people
